DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate changes in new plasma stroke biomarker panel in patients undergoing cardiac surgery with the use of cardiopulmonary bypass.
DOC.brief_title: Serial Measurement of a Plasma Stroke Biomarker Panel in Patients Undergoing Cardiac Surgery With Cardiopulmonary Bypass
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years Elective cardiac surgery with the use of cardiopulmonary bypass Patients undergoing emergent procedures Patients with preoperative mechanical support
